sn47.29:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn47.29:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena sirivaḍḍho gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn47.29:4.3: Atha kho sirivaḍḍho gahapati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn47.29:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkama;
sn47.29:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
sn47.29:4.7: So āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
sn47.29:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn47.29:4.10: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so puriso sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn47.29:4.11: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn47.29:4.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn47.29:4.13: “sirivaḍḍho, bhante, gahapati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati.
sn47.29:4.15: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn47.29:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn47.29:5.3: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn47.29:5.4: “kacci te, gahapati, khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn47.29:5.7: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn47.29:6.2: ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.29:6.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassan’ti.
sn47.29:7.1: “Yeme, bhante, bhagavatā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā desitā saṃvijjanti, te dhammā mayi, ahañca tesu dhammesu sandissāmi.
sn47.29:7.2: Ahañhi, bhante, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.29:7.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.29:7.6: Yāni cimāni, bhante, bhagavatā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni desitāni, nāhaṃ, bhante, tesaṃ kiñci attani appahīnaṃ samanupassāmī”ti.
